thread.title: Trump says it's OK to break with NRA on gun violence

title: Trump says it's OK to break with NRA on gun violence
text:
Trump says it's OK to break with NRA on gun violence Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 02:15 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday told governors at the White House they should not be afraid to fight the National Rifle Association after a Florida attacker killed 17 people in one of the country’s deadliest school shootings this month. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday told governors at the White House they should not be afraid to fight the National Rifle Association after a Florida attacker killed 17 people in one of the country’s deadliest school shootings this month.
